QuestData.Title: Wrathion Awaits
QuestData.Description:
These eggs represent a new generation of dragonkind. They must be protected and fostered. Yet... my heart aches, and I worry for Wrathion. I fear his stubborn determination will lead to folly.
You have been a trusted friend over the years, $n. Perhaps you can go in my place, and help him.
Seek him out at the Obsidian Bulwark. And please, watch over him. There are so few of his flight left.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with Wrathion at the Obsidian Bulwark.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet with Wrathion at the Obsidian Bulwark.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, champion--your arrival is most fortuitous. With you here now, my plan will certainly succeed.
